messages: Hey <@{userId}>! Just checking in - haven't heard from you in a bit!
<@{userId}>! I was just thinking about our last conversation. What's new?
*waves* Hi <@{userId}>! I hope you're having a great day!
<@{userId}>! I found something interesting and thought of you. How have you been?
Hey <@{userId}>, I was getting a little lonely over here. Tell me what's up!
<@{userId}>! Long time no chat! What's on your mind today?
Hi <@{userId}>! Just popping in to say hello. What's new with you?
<@{userId}>! I was wondering what you've been up to. Let's catch up!
default: Hello <@{userId}>! How are you doing today?
